# routeChoices

**Instance Property**

The list of route choices for the trip.

## Declaration

```swift
var routeChoices: [CPRouteChoice] { get }
```

## Getting Route Choices

- **destinationNameVariants**: An array of strings that represents the names of the destination for this trip, arranged from most to least preferred.

items.description: An array of strings that represents the names of the destination for this trip, arranged from most to least preferred.
items.name: destinationNameVariants
